title: Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning in Business
headline: Explore the applications of AI, machine learning and deep learning in various industries in this free online course.
description: We cannot overstate the importance and use of artificial intelligence (AI) to the present day. AI has altered communities and economies by increasing human labour's speed, efficiency and precision in fields ranging from robotics to fraud detection and online commerce. We designed this course to create awareness for both computer specialists and newcomers interested in a career in AI. This course introduces the basics of AI and its subsets.
courseDescription:
Artificial intelligence talents are in high demand across all industry sectors and occupations. Predictably, we believe the IT industry, finance and computer vocations have the most need, but this is often not the case. Artificial intelligence (AI) is the emulation of human intelligence processes by machines, influencing the future of almost every industry and human being. Therefore, we have created this course as a refresher for computer experts or newcomers interested in exploring the area of artificial intelligence. We begin with an overview of AI processes, then delve into machine learning (ML), a subset of AI, and deep learning (DL), a subset of ML.

We'll examine the distinctions between artificial intelligence, machine learning and deep learning and their prerequisites. Following that, you will discover how AI, ML and DL may help with revenue and business growth, brand proliferation and creating an incredible customer experience. Next, learn how AI, ML and DL have aided the health business, specifically vaccine research, as well as the railway, real estate and hotel industries. Finally, we will show you case studies of AI, ML and DL in diverse sectors and an overview of jobs performed by the trio and associated terminologies.

We cannot over-emphasise the use and importance of artificial intelligence in today's world. Examples include robotics, fraud detection, delivering ads to the correct audience with greater assurance through online commerce and hotel and railway automation. This course covers all the elements and knowledge you'll need to get started in the domain of artificial intelligence. Enrol today!

All are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison , please visit our FAQs.
